program.name: DepthOfCoverage
program.description: Assess sequence coverage by a wide array of metrics, partitioned by sample, read group, or library

option.label: Gene List
option.description: Calculate coverage statistics over this list of genes

option.label: omit DepthOutput At Each Base
option.description: Disabling the tabulation of total coverage at every base should speed up processing.

option.label: Count Type
option.description: How should overlapping reads from the same fragment be handled?

option.label: Max base Quality
option.description: Bases with quality scores higher than this threshold will be skipped.

program.name: SelectVariants
program.description: Select a subset of variants from a larger callset

option.label: Select Expression
option.description: One or more criteria to use when selecting the data. See GATK doc

option.label: invert selection
option.description: Invert the selection criteria for select

option.label: Max Indel Size
option.description: Maximum size of indels to include

option.label: Output
option.description: File to which variants should be written

program.name: PhaseByTransmission
program.description: Compute the most likely genotype combination and phasing for trios and parent/child pairs

option.label: Father Allele First
option.description: Ouputs the father allele as the first allele in phased child genotype. i.e. father|mother rather than mother|father.

option.label: Mendelian Violations File
option.description: File to output the mendelian violation details

option.label: Output
option.description: File to which variants should be written
